All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyAccessor<D,R>
public class TransitivePropertyAccessor<D extends BioPAXElement,R>
extends DecoratingPropertyAccessor<D,R>

This class is a transitive decorator for PropertyAccessors. BioPAX has three transitive properties: memberEntityReference, memberEntityFeature, component. These all represent nested containment relationships. When decorating a suitable property accessor this accessor will traverse the whole nesting hierarchy and bring all children( or if inverse parents). For example when used on a Complex.getComponent() it will not only return the immediate components but also the components of the components.
